info.name: data-test-mgmt
info.description:
#### Create item 

Type of items

- BASIC_CREDENTIASL

- OAUTH_CLIENT_CREDENTIALS

- MSISDN

- TOKEN

request.description:
Required attributes 
 
 - **resourceGroup**
 - **backendName**
 - **country**
 - **type**
 - **data**

#### Create an item for a basic_credentials

```json
{
    "resourceGroup":"AMAZON_PRIME",
    "backendName":"FOX",
    "country":"BO",
    "data":{
        "user":"user1",
        "pass":"pass1"
    },
    "typeItem":"BASIC_CREDENTIALS"
}
```

#### Create an item for a oauth_client_credentials type

```json
{
    "resourceGroup":"AMAZON_PRIME",
    "backendName":"CINEMAX",
    "country":"CO",
    "data":{
        "clientId":"xxx3434mnnndfd",
        "clientSecret":"xxx344434234"
    },
    "typeItem":"OAUTH_CLIENT_CREDENTIALS"
}
```

#### Create an item for msisdn type

```json
{
    "resourceGroup":"MI_tienda",
    "backendName":"backofficeco",
    "country":"CO",
    "data":{
        "msisdn":"571345543122"
    },
    "planName":"PRE_PAGO",
    "conditions":["SIN_SALDO"],
    "typeItem":"MSISDN"
}
```

#### Create an item for token type

```json
{
    "resourceGroup":"MI_tienda",
    "backendName":"ESPN",
    "country":"BO",
    "data":{
        "token":"bffgfgfdg-3433fdfdsfs-bvbfdgfgadsada"
    },

    "typeItem":"TOKEN"
}
```

Required attributes
